description: This is a KBase dynamic service module dedicated to providing a JSONRPC 2.0 service for accessing jobs via the KBase Job browser. It is a "Back End for Front End" (BFF) service, meaning that it is dedicated to serving a specific front end web app, in this case the Job Browser.
name: Job Browser BFF
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
